name: GHOSTKILLER
description:
GHOSTKILLER is a retro-looking FPS game for Trijam 212.

Sadly I was away during a majority of the time of Trijam 212, and did not have all the time I would have liked to have. If I had more time, I would have expanded upon the game much more. Let me know if you think I should do this, as I actually really enjoyed making this game and think that it could be much better (eg: levels, player health mechanic, better enemies, improved UI, ammo, bosses, etc).

If you played GHOSTKILLER, thanks a lot! Hope ya enjoyed this really basic version/prototype of a project I am actually keen on working on :)
